Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) shares experienced unusual options activity on Thursday. The stock price moved down to $130.01 following the option alert.
  • Sentiment: BULLISH
  • Option Type: SWEEP

articles.title: Check your tickets! Mega Millions ticket bought in New Jersey is worth $1 million - News 12 Bronx
articles.description: One lucky Mega Millions ticket bought in New Jersey is worth $1 million, matching five of the six numbers.
articles.content:
One lucky Mega Millions
ticket bought in New Jersey is worth $1 million, matching five of the six

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Pharmacist accused of spoiling vaccine has license suspended - KOKH FOX25
articles.description: MILWAUKEE (AP) — A state board on Wednesday suspended the license of a Wisconsin pharmacist accused of ruining more than 500 doses of COVID-19 vaccine because he thought it was unsafe. Steven Brandenburg was working at Advocate Aurora Health in Grafton,…

articles.author: Elizabeth Culliford, Jeffrey Dastin
articles.title: Exclusive: Parler CEO says social media app, favored by Trump supporters, may not return - Reuters
articles.description: Social media platform Parler, which has gone dark after being cut off by major service providers that accused the app of failing to police violent content, may never get back online, said its CEO John Matze.
